sentences.sentence: Some Soviet aviators went to war to defend Wuhan.
sentences.translation: 一些苏联飞行员曾参与保卫武汉的战役。

sentences.sentence: The prototype will be unveiled on June 26th by Solar Impulse, a project the aviators run.
sentences.translation: 飞行员运营的项目“太阳驱动”将会在6月26日展示样机。

sentences.sentence: I wasn't able to write anything for few days because I was conducting sunglasses ray bans Aviators training for our company.
sentences.translation: 一段时间以来我都无法写些东西，因为我正在执行我司的飞行员太阳眼镜品牌培训。
